mapper.select: SELECT a_idx, u_idx, a_name, a_area, a_address, a_ground, a_content, a_date, a_reple, a_vcount, a_total, a_evalunum, a_picfile, a_lat, a_lng FROM ( SELECT a_idx, u_idx, a_name, a_area, a_address, a_ground, a_content, a_date, a_reple, a_vcount, a_total, a_evalunum, a_picfile, a_lat, a_lng, ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY a_idx DESC) AS rnum FROM area )WHERE rnum BETWEEN #{param1} AND #{param2}
